longerdays.title: LongerDays
longerdays.description: At LongerDays, I worked on the design, development, and branding for the company's web presence.

minnow.title: Minnow CSS
minnow.description: A passion project of mine for building front-end web interfaces with a lightweight set of tools. Minnow is a Sass / CSS framework I created that does not contain any extra bloat.

parentville.title: Parentville
parentville.description: At Revel Marketing I was fortunate enough to develop a playful project that used parallax design. I was responsible for the assembly of the interface and interactions.

momsbloom.title: Mom's Bloom
momsbloom.description: Through GiveCamp GR I had the opportunity to be a part of the team creating a new web presence for the non-profit, Mom's Bloom.
